items.title: ARCHICAD 22: Beginner and Intermediate Level

Make an architectural project from start to finish, with all the technical drawings of floor plans, sections, facades, details, schedules and 3D rendered model.

items.headline: Learn how to understand and make Islamic geometric patterns
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to draw four Islamic geometric patterns

In this course, you will learn about fourfold and sixfold geometric patterns

items.title: Structural Steel Design: Learn the Principles of Design
items.headline: Understand the foundations and design a laterally supported steel element with ease (bending, axial and shear)
objectives_summary: The basics of structural loading and limit state design
The advantages, and disadvantages, of using structural steelwork
An understanding of the failure modes in bending, axial, shear and lateral torsional buckling (LTB is introduced only)

items.title: Learn To Read Structural Drawings: With Real Site Videos
items.headline: Full Course On Reading and Comprehending Civil Engineering Structural Drawings with real site videos.
objectives_summary: Read structural drawings easily.
Read detailed drawings of footings, slab, beam, column, staircase, etc.
Plan and execute the construction projects.
